website_summaries.verdict: Fitness-focused Samsung smartwatch that looks great and holds its charge for days. High quality product.
pros: 3 color options that all coordinate well with most outfits
Can easily change the bands for different color and size
cons: Reported issues with software and possible step inaccuracies

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It's beautiful as well. I've had all of the gear s watches and the galaxy watch is definitely worth the upgrade if you're looking for a more feminine piece. Yes, I miss MST but I have the note 8 and I can just use my phone. It's not a big deal. Bixby, when it works, is also a nice touch. The new exercise tools are also great.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Blanding

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth version does not support text messaging
customer_reviews.text: Spoke with Samsung support after receiving the watch and trying to find the messages app, and was notified that message notifications and text messages are only supported by carrier purchased devices. Returned device immediately as it's functionality is extremely limited in this version. It makes little sense that Samsung would make a watch version that can receive calls and Snapchat notifications but doesn't support text through Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Barnum

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!!!!!!!!! Product is NOT ready for consumers.
customer_reviews.text: This product cannot do what it has been advertised to do. It counts every 10th step and the heart rate monitor is a joke!. The device is BEAUTIFUL however Samsung forgot to make it functional! Even after firmware updates and following procedures to shut down some of the watches functionality, at the end of the day it does not work and should have never been released. I will be returning mine on Monday and go with another smart watch... although I love the idea of the watch, sadly it is still JUST an idea...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Melton

customer_reviews.title: False advertising  for battery Life.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint because I absolutely LOVEEE MY WATCH. Is that the battery life I thought is supposed to last up to 3 days but with a full charge I get a day with it. So not sure how they can say it lasts for 3 days. Not very happy about that. Maybe if you have it on watch only and disable everything else running I. The background as far as apps. You could possibly get the 3 days. Other than that it lasts for 1 Day!
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Not ready to take on TomTom, Garmin or Polar yet!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is aesthetically beautiful, but has some significant issues that makes me warn others not to purchase it. First, if your primary purpose is fitness, the GPS is VERY poor, the heart rate monitor plainly does not work during workouts, and the watch DOES NOT count swim laps in the pool. This even after a reset to factory. Also, the software used to record fitness, Samsung Health, recently released version 6, which eliminated all the connected services except for Strava. So if you use any other fitness platform you'll have to enter your activities manually. I recommend waiting for the next version... or a firmware update at the very least.
customer_reviews.author: Ron  Eberts

customer_reviews.title: Great smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smartwatch. So far, I really like it. It was a quick and easy setup. I just wish it was a bit thinner. There aren't that many apps. Fingers crossed more come out!
customer_reviews.author: Symone

customer_reviews.title: Compatibility sucks!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is nicely built, but it kills me that I cannot access crucial Google apps like tasks, keep and so on. That's a deal breaker for me and I am sorry I bought it. If you are invested in Google apps and use them often, I would advise you to stay away from this thing. I mean, the reason I left Apple for Android in smartphones was because I hated the exclusive ecosystem of Apple, which I felt it was an extortion for us to keep buying Apple products. I certainly don't want to be trapped in another ecosystem (Samsung's) which to add insult to injury is not as attractive as the Apple ecosystem. Booh!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: horrible product!! Is not accurate about steps you've taken or how many calories you burn. I bought this solely for the fitness section and its the biggest disappointment ever.!
customer_reviews.author: jasmin daboin

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Not the watch I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: OMG. I really wanted this watch to be awesome. Contrary to all the good reviews I read during my research, this watch is annoying at best. I need something that connects to the phone and JUST WORKS. It forces you to fiddle with it during the moments you needed it to make your life easier. Missed taps, mysterious voices talking through the speaker during workouts (I have bluetooth headphones on and the rest of the gym has to listen to the watch randomly talking) I HATE this thing. Samsung has completely failed with force-feeding Bixby to it's customer base. I hate it so much.
customer_reviews.author: With love by Ash

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged item
customer_reviews.text: Becareful before you buy this product was a repackaged item and it was sold as new double taped on the box and the watch has finger prints
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: This watch was advertised as a US watch, but was actually an international version. When Samsung sent an update to this watch it became unusable. It was supposedly under warranty but Samsung cannot fix it. Very disappointed in the seller and in Amazon since the problem did not show up until after the 60 day return window had passed. Samsung, World Sellers and Amazon are all denying responsibility for this watch that I spent my Christmas gift cards for. I am very unhappy with this nice looking watch that no longer works at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly W

customer_reviews.title: NOT US Version - Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The watch performed perfectly bu this is NOT a US version. When the package arrived I noticed that the watch's box security seal had already been broken. In hindsight a huge red flag. Additionally when initially setting up the watch and through several resets the initial language always defaulted to Spanish. After talking with Samsung tech support I finally figured out this watch was an international version and does not have the ability to operate Samsung Pay. It's a feature that not everyone will use but it confirms that this is most definitely not a US version.
customer_reviews.author: Deb B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It's a massive disappointment that the second day the step counter stopped working. I emailed Samsung about it and waited.....and waited.....then i did some research to see if there was an update or something i was doing wrong. I came across that this is an issue that isn't being acknowledge by Samsung and they on this site were just telling people to reset their watches. It seemed that no one including myself had any luck with the reset. I sent mine back and now i have a Fitbit. this was so disappointing, i loved the watch but irritated when day two it wasn't working correctly. you pay all that money to have a watch not work......that's just wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Get it already.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. No issues so far. Thousands of watch faces to choose from. Neat gadget. The band it comes with is sooo ugly so i swapped it out asap with a 20mm band.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: This is advertised as a watch with a US warranty. That isn't true!
customer_reviews.text: The watch works ok but Samsung confirmed this does not have a US warranty. I bought from world_sellers. They advertised this as having a US warranty which turned out to be a bold faced lie. I would be careful buying this if you need the US warranty or the apps that the US version of the watch comes with standard that cannot be downloaded on non US versions of the watch (Samsung Pay is one such example).
customer_reviews.author: psycho_raze

customer_reviews.title: Charger all fake and not charging. Don’t purchase from this supplier
customer_reviews.text: The watch was original but the charger provided is duplicate and socket and wire all duplicate. It’s not charging properly. Not worth for the money
customer_reviews.author: Sujit Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Battery got up to 132F on the charger and doesn't work! Fire Hazard waiting to happen!
customer_reviews.text: Was super happy to try and give this to my Wife for Christmas. Im glad I decided to open it up and charge it! Got up to 132F. Took a picture at 125.7F and charged it till I saw 132F and said thats enough its defective. Sad deal having a hard time getting a replacement. Amazon now has my money and I cant get my refund until they get the watch back. Then 7 days after that I get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch but this is an international version, NOT US VERSION!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the watch, and love it! But I couldn't get Samsung Pay to work... upon more research and calling Samsung, they ran the serial/model number and told me it was an international version, which doesn't get Samsung pay. Contacted the seller and they refunded, thankfully, but the listing still shows US version, which it isn't. Ended up going to Best Buy and getting the US version of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Matty D

customer_reviews.title: There is no way this was actually inspected.
customer_reviews.text: Came with 0% charge, will not charge on the charger just gets super hot and displays an error on the watch face. I left it on the charge and walked my dog for 30 minutes and could barely pick it up it was so hot. There is no way this was actually inspected. You cant run diagnostics on a device with 0 battery.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin M E Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not as good as other watches
customer_reviews.text: Overall the watch is decent but I liked my Fossil Q Founder watch better. The watch has some newer features I was looking for but Android Wear is way better than Samsung's software.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but still expensive for what it provides
customer_reviews.text: As a smart watch I think it's good, battery life easy 2 days plus, esthetically beautiful but still not worth 300+ price for supplied features. Dial ring feels fragile but it's working flawlessly. It will need couple years for smart watches to evolve. One warning though, carefully inspect your watch if you're buying it from amazon warehouse. I had to return 2 of them because there was no Samsung pay preinstalled as it should be on US version and serial numbers didn't match (package box and actual watch inside). Third looks like lucky charm. We'll see how it will hold up in couple of weeks
customer_reviews.author: dare

customer_reviews.title: NOT A SAMSUNG "USA" WATCH
customer_reviews.text: After spending well over an hour with Samsung, trying to get the watch registered, came to discover this was a "Samsung Vietnam" watch, and while it had a warranty, any warranty service would be through Samsung Vietnam, and I presume, I'd have to send the watch there for service. Note that the description says "US Version with Warranty" this is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: robert acheson

customer_reviews.title: No good in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Heart rate monitor, altimeter, and barometer stopped working after less than 2 months. The support for it was no help. Spend the money on a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Clawges

customer_reviews.title: Best smart watch for Samsung phones
customer_reviews.text: I have had many smart watches - all of them Android Wear. This is my first venture into the Samsung Tizen area and I am blown away! The watch delivers all that I have wanted from a Wear device and more. The bezel functionality should be a standard across all wearable devices IMO as it makes it so easy to navigate notifications, widgets etc. Perhaps the only drawback with this watch is the application ecosystem- the lack of applications but, as I have everything I need, I am a convert!
customer_reviews.author: Chris P. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: carriers dont like third party items
customer_reviews.text: love this watch, beware getting it set up with your provider seems the make it easier if you buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Canfield

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Omg, its perfect. It was new and I got the one that I could connect a line to it. It's the perfect accessory to my cell. The volume is clear, voice is clear, images are clear, and prices is perfect. Best buy
customer_reviews.author: AllMe

customer_reviews.title: Step count and heart rate not accurate
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for fitness do not get this watch but everything else it's a nice watch
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Check your carrier for LTE calling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before double triple verifying with my (incompetent) carrier Sprint that this model will work by itself for calling/texting. This LTE version is not on Sprint yet, the Galaxy Active 2 does work. But I chose this Galaxy Watch 42mm which I like but (for now) it only works with your phone nearby on bluetooth or Wifi. The agents were super confused and frustrating until one finally said this model isn't programmed yet. They signed me up for extra 15 per month before knowing this was not a working model! Trying to hold out for their LTE update or just return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS FIRST BEFORE POWERING WATCH UP!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Take my advice and remove samsung gear app phone first before connecting to phone. The new galaxy wearable app will not allow some apps on phone to work if old app on phone. Had to call samsung and samsung pay for this to be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this model!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch sucks....the battery life is 1 day if lucky, steps and heart rate are not accurate. I put a screen protector on it and it tapped my seat belt buckle and put a hole and cracks in the screen. Do not buy this model of you want to have accurate heart rate, calorie loss, steps, etc.. I would rather have the fitbit model which battery last so much longer or I are I'll get the bigger model. Don't waste your money on this model.
customer_reviews.author: amanda mabern

customer_reviews.title: Samsung made major improvements with this watch
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy and easy to get setup with my mobile phone carrier. I love the fact that if I leave my phone I can still get texts, calls and emails.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: If heath monitoring, steps and usability matters...DON'T buy this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this watch for a few months now, the only words I can manage to describe it is very disappointed! Steps are never right, Ever! Heart Rate seems on par with Fitbit except does not indicate physical fitness and overall analytics are not nearly as good. Floors are never right. Ever! stress monitoring is new and seems relatively right.....most of the time Battery life is MUCH worse than Fitbit, the term "lasts for days" is a complete falsehood Sleep monitoring seems on par with fitbit but has much less comparative data Lots of watch face types if that matters All in all.......... I should switch to apple!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: Just so you know...the seller advertises this as a "US Warranty version" that is not the case...I went to the Samsung web site to register my watch and it wouldn't recognize the serial #...so I got on the phone w/ Samsung customer service...they found the serial # in their system...BUT it was manufactured in South America, therefore NO warranty...the writing on the outside of the box is in Spanish...just BEWARE...also there were 2 other UPC stickers w/ serial #'s over the original...if you don't care about a warranty...carry-on...if you do...buy elsewhere...it's still a very good watch...works mostly great...which is why I gave 5 stars...
customer_reviews.author: Cleo

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Version?
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say that for sure, but I believe that the version being sold is not the US. It simply didn't come with Samsung Pay whatsoever. I'm a previous owner of a Gear S3, so I know how to enable it. Another weird thing is the charger that came along with it. It had no detachable cord. I happened to return it and buying one on a physical store. That came with a detachable charger cord and Samsung Pay was there after pairing with my S8+ and logged in to Samsung account.
customer_reviews.author: GMiscow

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hardware With Lacking Software
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with a Pixel 2 smartphone. Out of the box the construction seems top notch with premium and solid materials. Setup was straightforward requiring installation of Samsung specific apps for my non-Samsung phone. Reason for 4-star review is the pretty lackluster software selection and realization that this will not be fully functional with my Pixel device. Additionally, notifications did not seem to work reliably. Overall, I suspect this would have been a better experience had it been paired with a Samsung mobile device, but the advertised integration with other Android devices was not up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, may not be US version
customer_reviews.text: My watch came from Kanga Supply (it's who Amazon automatically picked when I ordered). When I first turned on the watch, everything was in Spanish. Okay, wierd, but I figured out how to change it to English. Now I can't install Samsung Pay on it. Some research on the internet indicates that it's not a US version of the watch, and probably from a region that doesn't have Samsung Pay service.
customer_reviews.author: Camelfoe

customer_reviews.title: Don't rely on heartbeat and sleep tracking
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this two weeks, but it fails to track the information that I care about: heartbeat and sleep quality (which I infer is related to heartrate). The only response that I've received is to reset to manufacturer's settings. Although not's terribly difficult to do, it is a pain in the ***. If I'd wanted something this difficult, I would have bought a 30 dollar knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had returned another brand smart watch for this, best decision of the week! The battery on this actually lasts almost 2 full days (way better than the <1 of previous). UI is sleek. My wife wore this and I wore a FItbit and we walked 3 about 3 miles, my watch told me 3.04 and this one read 3.15 miles. Not sure why the discrepancy or which is accurate, but just providing some info :D Yes this watch isn't the cheapest, and there's a reason, it actually works! Maybe not quite as fashionable out of the box, but slap on a fance band and you're all set. Don't forget your screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: David V. Hoppel Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Charging is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not last 3 days. I only feel comfortable charging every night.
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: False Description
customer_reviews.text: The model they are selling is not the one advertised. This model is not LTE capable ,which is the main reason I bought it. I was in touch with Samsung to make sure I didn't make a mistake. When I read the model to them, they confirmed that it's not LTE capable model. They are charging more for the cheaper model. I`m shocked that they are getting away with this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Actual material product 5/5 loved it. App selection 0/5...
customer_reviews.text: The fact that Samsung considered me using Google on the watch as a 3rd party app disappointed me immensely. Samsung you use ANDROID as a base to your software so you are a 3rd party app on top of googles software... Please try and make sure one of the MOST used software on android is supported then I might consider buying a watch. Again the physical product loved everything the feel, weight, how it navigated just loved it but the software no thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Roberts

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: They advertise this item as "US Version" but it isn't! I purchased it and was missing a few features. When I contacted Samsung and gave them the serial number they informed me it was a Caribbean model which does not have the same features as the US version. They would not exchange it for the correct model. I had to return and am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Moe

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: watch is exactly what I expected. beautiful to look at and use. the only reason it didn't get 5 stars is because Bixby is complete garbage, also I live in Canada and my debit card is not compatible with Samsung pay in the gear app.
customer_reviews.author: brad M.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: Electronics Basket is selling the wrong watches
customer_reviews.text: Samsung Galaxy Watch listed as US version is really an international version, and therefore not compatible Samsung Pay App. Looks like I'm not the only one having this issue with this seller. Complete waste of time and shipping money
customer_reviews.author: Ladaga

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for what they ship you
customer_reviews.text: I bought a US version and could not get it to register... well, it turns out that they tried to repackage a Chinese one (verified by Samsung) as a US version. Which was also looked used (it was very dirty and the battery was dead) Don't waste your time or money. They did it to me, they'll do it to you too. Update: I have reported ELEX STORE to Amazon for fraud. Will update when I get resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and returned
customer_reviews.text: I have an IPhone but liked the way this watch looked better than the apple watch. This watch was impossible to pair correctly and get all of the features to work. I tried for a few days and talked to customer support. I kept getting told I needed to download an app for each feature I wanted to use so it could be compatible. Also, since it was constantly syncing the battery would die before the end of the work day. I got annoyed and returned it. Ended up getting an apple watch which paired with no issues. I'm sure this issue does not reflect on this watch itself but the compatibility between Apple and Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Monsur

customer_reviews.title: Device was defective/dead
customer_reviews.text: The watch, inspite of being charged, would not go on. Putting back on the charger indicates high battery level. Upon unplugging, watch goes on and doesn't survive upto pairing level. Once it goes off, the same cycle repeats. Doesn't go on until put to the charger again, for however short period. Then it will go on again. The sensor cover behind the watch was loosely held by a tape sticker. On removing the tape, it came off as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good looking watch faces which don't look "geeky" Solid bluetooth connection to Galaxy SS9+ phone for calls, messages, email, and notifications Reasonably good battery life Cons: If health monitoring functions are important to you, buy something else. Forums are full of complaints about heart rate, step/floor counting, sleep quality, and other monitoring functions that simply don't work. App availability from Samsung App Store very poor compared to Android App Store My "Return Window" is closed, or I'd probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: CriticalMass

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch.
customer_reviews.text: Wow,i really enjoy having and using this watch. Besides the fact that it looks great but the features are amazing. From being able to send and recieve calls and messages,listen to music,use navigation and customize the face,and of course the best feature if u have the lte version,if u happen to forget ur phone at home or in the car while running in to the store or a friends house,u can text or call right from ur watch. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: William.h

customer_reviews.title: International Version NOT U.S. BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as US Version, but upon calling Samsung for troubleshooting and giving them the serial number (which they tried to cover with a sticker), they revealed it is indeed the international version, limiting its features. For example, no Samsung pay. Please verify! this is not legit!!!! People are getting fooled
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I like it; nice feminine sports watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sports watch I think it is elegant and looks like a classic watch and not too bulky. I bought interchangeable bands that really dress it up and again it still looks like a nice dressy woman's watch instead of a big clunky cold sports device.
customer_reviews.author: Justformomma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch, excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: Simply perfect! Everything I need is in this watch, I can go out and leave my phone at home because I the watch does the same things as my phone. The only thing I miss is the WhatsApp, but still worh it About the Seller, the watch came in excellent conditions, I had no problems, by the way, I'd like to thank the seller for being very attentive
customer_reviews.author: Henrique Saladino

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for money!
customer_reviews.text: Great display, no longer have to press a button to make watchface light up like non-smart watches do.the health stuff is great feature and joggers get good idea where target heart rate is. The exercise feature is worthless though, this stuff could be removed to free up space, it’s pretty inaccurate.most people need bpm and stress level.i find the stress monitor accurate, when I’m stressed it shows! Edit: the sleep tracking really works, I lift weights early morning and take a nap when I’m finished, it breaks it down into regular, deep and rem level sleep.it feels very accurate, almost shocking how spot on the galaxy is.
customer_reviews.author: John rambo

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: There was little to no touch screeen sensitivity and since i wasnt get a warranty when i bought the watch i am stuck with it. Now it wouldnt charge properly wish i could return it
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Fitness and pulse tracking works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd smartwatch and seems to be just what I was looking for. Tracks my heart beat really well, way better than my previous two models. Love the notification feature for emails and text messages and the ability to respond on the watch. This is the bluetooth version so it cant perform the "number share" with your cell phone. Battery life is about 2 days max, wish it was better. I usually charge mine at night so dont use the sleep monitoring part of it. Tried charging it when in the shower but it doesnt charge fast enough in 30 minutes. I use it mainly for pulse monitoring and fitness tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Maki

customer_reviews.title: I love my Watch
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a birthday present from my husband for my 50th in April. I've been using it since! I get so many compliments daily. When I got it, it connected to my Note 9 like they knew each other! It's durable as I've smashed it several times and not a scratch. I love the many different watch faces available. It keeps track of my steps and reminds me when I've been idle for too long. (LOL - it's like - hi there, we've noticed you're just sitting there, here's a sneaker to remind you it's time to walk...) Overall, a great little gadget and time teller!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Carucci

customer_reviews.title: I got fooled, it's not a US version with warranty...
customer_reviews.text: I just found out from Samsung that the watch I received is an International version and not the US version I purchased. I quit receiving text messages, which is a big reason why I got the watch. The watch I received said it came with warranty, but after I had to send it to Samsung to repair it was told there is not warranty and it just cost me an additional $134 to get the correct motherboard on the watch so it will work in the US. Expensive lesson to learn, should have just stuck with purchasing from a trusted source like Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: V. G. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: NOT A USA WATCH
customer_reviews.text: Box came and it was completely in Spanish. seller said it has the same hardware as us version but the description never stated it was from Mexico made for Mexico with us version hardware. Do not trust this seller this is not described accurately. They admitted it's not made for the United States but has the same hardware as the United States. since they're charging full price you're better off looking elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Its a must!!
customer_reviews.text: Im in loveee with this watch pass all my expectations and finally something more geared to females..love rose gold and its a must buy guys..samsung you always amaze me team galaxy until I die!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Not US version!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the US version! No Samsung pay. I just called Samsung to verify the serial number and they told me this is the international version.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Tran

customer_reviews.title: Can't reply to texts if you have iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Beware iPhone users! Con- You cannot reply to texts from your watch, even via Bluetooth, if you have an iPhone. Wish I would have opened the box and learned this before return window closed. LOVE the rotating bezel to move between apps. Con- However, while the watch is comfortable, it does not track steps very well. I work in hospitality and my iPhone has consistently and accurately tracked my steps. The watch will say 3,500 steps but iPhone will say 7,000+ which is far more consistent with an 8 hour shift in a huge, busy resort.
customer_reviews.author: May Latte

customer_reviews.title: When will the Fall Detecter finally arrive?
customer_reviews.text: Hello After a lot of learning the ropes about how to utilize the best and uniques of the Amazon Watch 1 and finally feeling I did it right ,I went to sleep on the third day after owning the watch and it was frozen where I left it, the nite before. I'm a lot worried about buying the new watch 2 which will be released next week. Great watch but now $450.00 and still no guarantee that what I needed the most, the falling detection will ever arrive for the Watch 2. Herb Lipton. Herblip@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Herb Lipton

customer_reviews.title: Sensor started to unstick....
customer_reviews.text: I bought my watch end of January, picked up my watch today 7th of May. Realized that I wasnt getting my notifications even though I was getting....when I took off my watch, the sensor was off center, literally you could move it around seeing the glue at the bottom, I'm like wtf, really. What should I do about this? This is really upsetting
customer_reviews.author: Chef Juman

customer_reviews.title: Stolen merchandise being sold. Good watch though
customer_reviews.text: The watch I ordered here was great as as expected and very high quality. However upon registering the device with Samsung warranty I was immediately contacted by their security department saying the watch I registered matches the number of a watch stolen in transit. They said it wasn't a problem they just needed all the info I had on the seller. Overall an unpleasant experience, and having stolen product is not something I was hoping for. TlDR- good watch just buy it from a different seller to avoid the possibility of receiving stolen goods.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Watch the like new items being sold
customer_reviews.text: Had the watch for 4-5 months. Turned it off to charge it one night. The next morning turned in back on and it started power cycling. It didn't stop power cycling until the battery was dead. So I sent it to Samsung and they said it is gonna be $351.00 to rebuild my 4-5 month old watch that had no physical or water damage. I think it has more to do with where I bought the watch then the company. I believe the item was used and listed as new.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good, a few real weaknesses
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch with some really useful functionality, but the wakeup gesture only works very intermittently (it's discussed heavily in the Samsung forums) and I have to say the app universe is smaller than I thought. The first can probably be fixed with a software update, but why would they release it like this? The second is a longer term problem...
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P.

customer_reviews.title: This watch is all you'll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this watch. I'm a 70's baby, and I can't believe how far technology has come. This watch is amazing, not only does it tell time, its keeps up with your stress levels, sleep patterns, appointments, its touch screen, you can listen to music, call and talk to people from the watch itself, and that's just a few things. It also has an app that you download and you can basically control your watch from this app, exp. I watched to change the screen saver on my watch, so I downloaded a free screen saver and applied it to my watch thru the app. Samsung out did themselves with this watch, it's an all-in-one watch.
customer_reviews.author: Rayray

customer_reviews.title: Aggravating and frustrating
customer_reviews.text: First off, I charged it to 100% but it wouldn't power on for 10 minutes. Difficulties connecting to WiFi and Bluetooth (I had to try over and over again), getting notifications (i.e. texts) was hit or miss, visible alerts same thing, getting the weather to display was not easy even after I followed directions, bezel started to feel sticky in the few hours I was attempting to set this watch up. Never worked correctly 100%, and to be honest, it is a bit sluggish. The best part was when I boxed it back up...My wife's Apple watch was so much easier, but I think they are ugly. Back to my Casio.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smart watch.
customer_reviews.text: After being a Fitbit wearer for over 6 years I was frustrated by yet another quality control or software issue. When my Versa2 locked up after 3 months and their solution was for me to mail it back THEN they would start the process to ship me a replacement (a 3-week turnaround), I decided it was time to move on. I looked and read revues and decided to buy a Galaxy Watch. I am happy with my choice. Battery life is good; charging is easy. I like being able to pick my watch face and include/exclude apps. I am so pleased that I have bought some extra bands from Barton Watch Bands.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Davis

customer_reviews.title: I like it, I just hope they fix all the bugs soon
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so pretty! But very buggy. My favorite smartwatch feature is sleep tracking. This watch is terrible at tracking my sleep and does not show when I was in each stage of sleep like my Gear Fit 2 did. I'm really upset about this. And there is no way to report errors to Samsung because this model is not on their "report an issue" list. Almost like they knew it had issues and released it anyway without any care to fix it. They really need to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: In a galaxy close close by
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. I was a Fitbit fan for quite a few years and this is a significant upgrade. Quality and durable build. Here's my only grievance. If you have sensitive skin make sure to swap out the included wristband with something else because it will tear up your wrists. Native apps like activity tracker, phone, sleep monitor, calorie counter, et al give me everything that I need and then some. Highly recommended but make sure you get a face and body protector for it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ridgeway H

customer_reviews.title: Life's easier
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. I have a samsung phone so syncs perfectly. Call audio quality and volume is great. People can hear me just fine even when I don't have the watch close to my face. Good for trscking activity levels, I don't leave the house without it anymore. Spotify syncs up well to my headphones and car and I download playlists or podcasts so I can listen to in offline mode although it does drain the battery. Battery life is 3 days but I haven't ran out of it in the 2 months I've had it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday and he has been really enjoying this watch! It does a great job tracking sleep, reminding you to get up if you get busy at work, and tracking exercise. He loves the face screen that looks like a traditional gear style watch. I got so jealous I ended up buying the female Samsung active watch for myself :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Information omitted that Samsung phones are not compatible!
customer_reviews.text: Looking to replace my Gear 3 that gave up the ghost and poor customer service for the Samsung Watch, I learned that my Samsung 8+ is not compatible. Per Samsung site, lists 12 phone brands that are compatible, but not Samsung! Ugh. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LLSteelersfan

customer_reviews.title: International version
customer_reviews.text: Bought the watch for my husband and we noticed upon opening the box that the outside was in spanish. Watch is fine, perfect condition but when uploading all the information we noticed that it did not have Samsung pay. A small minor thing that you can go without. Well I took the risk and sent it back to order another one to see if it was specifically that watch or if they all came that way. 2nd watch came in same thing. International version with a spanish box and no Samsung pay. Finally gave up and accepted fate with the watch, a couple of days later Samsung pay pops up. Watch hasn’t given him any issues since purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Hold Charge
customer_reviews.text: Wrong charge cord sent with watch, watch wouldn't charge properly with correct charger, and whole watch smelled of cigarette smoke—I couldn't get rid of smell despite several attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I like about it is the fact it looks like a real watch and the twist bezel What’s wrong with it is 1. Has iPhone app but takes forever to connect 2. Heart rate monitor is terrible. Constantly crashes saying clean it or move it. It’s crap 3. Battery life is crap too. Not many options to work with on it. Not a good buy at all
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: Not US version!!! Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Samsung pay does not work on the version of the watch I received. I will be returning it. I verified with Samsung that the watch they are selling as a US version, is not. Still selling these as a US version. They are not!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith A

customer_reviews.title: It's just eh
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this watch. It's very pretty and I like that it's water proof enough that I don't need to take it off everytime i get in the pool. The worst part is that the battery literally dies every other day. I haven't really tried to put many apps on because of how often the battery already dies so I'm really just wearing it to see the time, track my steps, and view my text messages. I'm hoping I can find some redeeming qualities about it so I don't regret spending this much money on it. If I had to do it again, I would likely have gotten another garmin.
customer_reviews.author: Shop_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Software for this toy is awful
customer_reviews.text: Software froze and watch was stuck. Spent 2 hours on phone with tect rep who could not figure it out. Threw it back and got my money refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Walter B

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but battery life is hinky
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch for the most part but on the last couple of weeks (I've had the watch for about 2 months now) I will suddenly run into a warning that I am at 12% battery life no more than 3-4 hours after I take it off the charger. I'm not doing anything special/different than before as near as I can tell. Problem is now I'm afraid to take the darn thing anywhere for an extended time ... like an overnight trip without a backup watch. That's not good. If Samsung has any magic words of wisdom, please let me know immediately. If this gets worse, I'll be reporting back.
customer_reviews.author: Keith W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch for Android Users
customer_reviews.text: If you have an Android phone, this is the watch to get. I'm not sold on the Tizen OS but the watch looks great on your wrist. Beware it's a bit large so it can look odd for people with smaller wrists. Also, the Samsung Health App isn't the greatest out there. Don't expect Apple Watch quality but for Android users, this is probably one of the best watches out there.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at getting this watch for quite some time. I finally bought it and I am very disappointed. I did not want my watch to act as a phone, at least not all the time. I tried all the options I could find, and then spent over an hour with samsung galaxy support and never received a resolution. Also he wake up feature didn't seem to work either. Even though it was set properly in settings, it would never turn on when I rotated my wrist. I had to always touch it to get the display to show. I didn't own the watch long enough to test any of the other features.....
customer_reviews.author: Tucsonian

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable, stylish smart watch
customer_reviews.text: I work at a retail store unloading trucks in the mornings. My Samsung watch is constantly getting hit against metal conveyer belts and, rubbed between boxes. And after two months of usage my watch has hardly sustained anything but a few tiny nicks here and there. Even without a screen protector the glass display doesn't have a single scratch on it! The picture is my watch after those two months of intense usage. Every time my watch gets dirty, I just slather some soap on, and rinse it clean! This thing is durable, and all around very high quality. Though I do wish it was more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Bad company. Bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I had issues from the beginning but was told their support team could work out the issues. Tried it, worked for a few weeks. Having major issues and can’t return it because we’re past the 30 days. Although we were not past the thirty days when I originally requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Prime

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your product is sealed and unopened
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware: after my family received this watch we first noticed that the tabs on the box itself were already broken. We contacted the seller regarding the issue and they assured us the product was new. After looking at unboxing videos online we noticed that the sellers removed the original charger and replaced it with a third party product. I’m uncertain of what else was done. We were lead to believe the watch brand new and UNopened, which was not the case. Extremely frustrating after spending so much money on this watch as a family gift.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: AS GOOD AS IT GETS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch. It does most everything right. Way more user friendly than the Apple watch. That thing is terrible. I have very low tweaks I would make if I was Samsung not to delete messages so quickly. Overall the watch is super rugged. Looks great. Its a little top heavy yet still comfortable. I give it 5 stars because there is nothing ive tried that better and easier to use. The rotating Bezel is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Turbolover22PSI

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this watch.
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using my watch (June 2019) it was great, however, it quickly became very laggy and unresponsive. I have gone over the rebooting with support, but that doesn't fix the slowness of this watch. I often have to reboot it because it wont respond to the buttons being pressed. I do not recommend buying one of these. I was hoping Samsung would be able to help me, but I am stuck with a paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Goitia

customer_reviews.title: Be aware.  Not a US version.
customer_reviews.text: Becareful. I ordered this watch and when it arrived I couldn't get all the functions it was suppose to have. I called Samsung and by the serial number I was told that this is not a US version, even though it stated that it was when I purchased it. I returned it, without any problems, and ordered one directly from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: djr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Rose Gold Samsung Galaxy Watch on 12.19.18 after seeing my sister's Frontier watch she got for Christmas. I never liked smart watches because they always seemed bulky to me but this watch is absolutely gorgeous and not huge! Settings were easy to navigate through. You can watch YouTube videos and go on Instgram via the browser you can download. It's loud enough, screen is crisp and clear and you can even do a slideshow of your pictures for your background. I do not regret this purchase one bit. I'm obsessed and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Calliope

customer_reviews.title: Returned only to find it's still the wrong version
customer_reviews.text: I returned my watch because it wasn't the U.S. version and my replacement was neither the U.S. version or the international version. It appeared to either be a Spanish or central American watch. All of the packaging was in Spanish. STOP CLAIMING IT'S THE U.S. VERSION IF IT ISN'T. You can't get Samsung pay and many of the features are restricted.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Wright

customer_reviews.title: Better than my Note 8!
customer_reviews.text: Galaxy Watch tracks my workouts better than my Note 8. The battery requires charging every night; battery charges quickly. A couple of features operate inconsistently: Floors and Auto-detection of workouts (physical activity). I set a daily goal for running up flights of stairs and sometimes my watch doesn't record when I go up a flight of stairs. My watch is also supposed to detect when I am performing a physical activity (e.g. washing car, landscaping, moving boxes, etc), but it has only worked once. Overall, I am very pleased with my Galaxy Watch.
customer_reviews.author: FlyDog

customer_reviews.title: Stupidwatch
customer_reviews.text: The hour and minute hands work, and some of the basic apps like the timer and alarms work too. But the notifications keep breaking down, and the only option is to do a hard reset of the phone and uninstall/reinstall the phone app. Because that's the point of a watch, to waste more time. And for some inexplicable reason, if I'm not wearing it, my bluetooth headphones won't stream music from my phone. I don't use the health app, because I track my own workouts, but those notifications keep popping up (as opposed to calendar reminders) and apparently can't be muted. But I spent too much money to toss this thing, so I guess I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: RobSRand

customer_reviews.title: Bad for surfing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the watch to track my surfing and see how many waves I got for the session and unfortunately the the watch had some looking for gps pop-up instead of working in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Oleksandr Kara

customer_reviews.title: Shipped the Fitbit back!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally purchased a Fitbit to help with my weight loss goals, but after wanting more features I decided to try this watch and see how I liked it. Its a night and day difference. It auto logs workouts, sleep and tells me how many more calories to burn each day to help me get to my weight goals. Its a bit much to set up and get moving, but once you get all of settings right its great!
customer_reviews.author: Kella Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Twice Received a Non-US version
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE. Check the model/Serial Number. I chatted with Samsung support twice to find out this fact. Returning each one that I ordered from different sellers. Wish Amazon did better vetting. I will be buying from another retail establishment. Note: If you cannot pull up Samsung Pay by holding the top button then this may be a good indication that it is a non-US model that is warranted.
customer_reviews.author: Live Life to the Fullest

customer_reviews.title: Nice new upgrade
customer_reviews.text: The watch is pretty good. The apps on it along the software is very similar to the gear 3. There is an added exercise settings, offering more than the gear 3. There are several new watch faces. It comes with a water lock mode and the battery life seems to be much longer than the gear 3. I am overall satisfied and very happy with the purchase upgrade. The only thing I did not know was that you cannot add any cellular service to these specific watches sold on Amazon, however, no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Main

customer_reviews.title: Will not honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: This watch is rated for 50 meters deep in water. It has never been more than 1 meter deep! It has malfunctioned (heart rate monitor stops occasionally). They will not honor the warranty claiming "water damage". First, even if there really was water damage, there would probably be a lot more serious issues than this. Secondly, if it did get water damage from 3 feet of water, that is clearly a defect on their part. Zero stars!
customer_reviews.author: GT2017

customer_reviews.title: Must cool it periodically to charge correctly.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I needed it to do as a smart watch. I do wish it had the ekg function. Warning! Warning every so often I have to place it in the freezer to get a100% charge. It starting happening after the upgrade. If not it will only charge to 50%. This is why I did not rate 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: michael thompson

customer_reviews.title: Watch is great, app sucks, battery mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I've had it for a few days now. Replaced my fitbits because I'm tired of them dying in under a year all the time. Battery life sucks compared to Fitbit, but I get why. I will have to charge every other day instead of twice a week now. Annoying but not a big deal really. And their app gets 1 star because it sucks. It helps you do some settings, but you can't see fitness tracking info like you can on Fitbit. That is where Fitbit wins, their app is exponentially better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch (46mm, GPS, Bluetooth) – Silver/Black (US Version)
product_meta.description: Style:Bluetooth| Size:46mm| Color:SilverLive a stronger, smarter life with Galaxy Watch at your wrist. Rest well, stay active and keep stress at bay with built in health tracking. Go for days without charging your watch. The Bluetooth connection keeps everything at your wrist. Compatible with select Bluetooth capable smartphones. Galaxy Watch supported features may vary by carrier and compatible device. For best results, connect with compatible Samsung Galaxy smartphones.) Battery life for Bluetooth (46mm) model is roughly three to four days. Battery life for LTE model and Bluetooth (42mm) model is roughly two to three days. Your results may vary. Do not expose the device to water at high pressure. Control all your connected home devices from your wrist even when you’re not home. Plus, get the details of a security camera alert from the SmartThings app on your Galaxy Watch.
feature_bullets: Live a stronger, smarter life with Galaxy Watch at your wrist. Rest well and stay active with built-in health tracking and a bluetooth connection that keeps everything at your wrist. Plus, go for days without charging.
Go nonstop for days on a single charge. The wireless charger lets you power up without slowing down. (Average expected performance based on typical use. Results may vary.)
Available in two sizes and three colors, the Galaxy Watch offers stylish watch faces so realistic they hardly look digital. Plus, choose from a collection of interchangeable bands.
Pairs with both Android and iOS smartphones via bluetooth connection.
Included in Box: Galaxy Watch, Additional Strap(Large and Small included), Wireless charging Dock, Travel Adaptor, Quick Start Guide, User Manual (Warranty: 1 Year Standard Parts and Labor)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars9,038 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Samsung Galaxy Watch^Straps^Wireless Charger^Wall Charger^USB-A to MicroUSB Cable^Quick Start Guide
